name: Silk chiffon scarf with MATT black sequins
description: Fabulous handcrafted scarf that's been beautifully made in India.. It's made by a community of ladies that sew each one by hand and it takes 15 hours to make each piece.  The dimensions are 70 inches long x 7.5 inches wide. The chiffon has raw edges and the sequins on this style are Matt black. As they are handmade, there maybe some slight imperfections and flaws.

description: Fabulous handcrafted scarf that's been beautifully made in India. It's made by a small community of ladies that sew each one by hand it takes 15 hours to make each piece. The dimensions are 70 inches long x 7.5 inches wide. All raw edges on the silk, as they are handcrafted  here maybe some slight imperfections and flaws. The sequins are shiny black.

name: Sari braid bag - 4 Green palate
description: Lovely sari braid bag, handmade in Pushkar. Each one is slightly different but this one is predominantly green tones. It measures 31cm x 36 cm, the strap is 100cm with a black zip and lining and an inside pocket. As they are all so different, once purchased I will send you a picture of yours so you can sense check you are TOTALLY happy with it. They are a great Christmas gift idea!

name: Kantha Tote Bag - Soft Lilac 10
description: Fabulous kantha tote bags, made out of recycled quilts from West Bengal. These bags are handcrafted in Jaipur and are a perfect size for work, the gym or carry on as your winter break beach bag! They are 59cm x 37 cm with an inside pocket, the lining is black. name: Silk and Kantha throw in soft yellow.
description: A fantastic silk throw with hand stitched kantha panels, all done by hand in India.  The silk is recycled and the panels are stitched by hand but finished with a machine edging. As they are recycled there maybe some slight imperfections with the fabric. They would be lovely as a wall hanging or as a throw for a sofa or a bed. This panel is 147cm x 147 cm. Very gentle hand wash please.

name: Silk Chiffon Sequinned scarf in Grey with Silver
description: Fabulous handcrafted scarf that's been beautifully made in India. It's made by a small community of ladies that sew each one by hand and it takes 15 hours to make each piece. The dimensions are 70 inches long by 7.5 inches wide. They will be your essential accessory piece for the season, they are so versatile and can be styled with denim or any outfit for a day to evening look. I have only made a small quantity, so if you love them, shop early!

name: Silk Tunic 10 Plum
description: Fantastic silk tunic, that can also be worn as a halter top, so a great 2 in 1 style, perfect worn with jeans for a casual night out. Handcrafted in Pushkar and made out of recycled vintage saris, therefore each one is unique, no two prints the same. As it is handcrafted, there maybe some slight imperfections, but this just adds to the beauty of them. They are 28 inches long and 40 inches wide, one size only but would comfortably fit a size 10 - 16. Please hand wash with care and dry and naturally.
